title: Widows
overview: "Facing life alone...they turned to crime together". Three armed robbers - Harry Rawlins, Terry Miller and Joe Pirelli - are killed during an armed robbery. They are survived by their widows, Dolly Rawlins, Shirley Miller and Linda Pirelli. With the police applying pressure, and a ival gang intending to take over Harry Rawlins' crime business, the widows turn to Dolly for leadership.
